sentences: Mul endal on hädasti tööde tegemist.
context: The word 'tööd' is the partitive singular and nominative plural form of the Estonian noun 'töö'. It can refer to work, tasks, chores, or business that needs to be done. In its plural form (nominative plural), it refers to multiple works or tasks. In the partitive singular case, it indicates an amount or portion of work.
